xs.description: Extra small select height (30px). Use for: compact forms, inline selects, space-constrained UIs. Matches xs input height.

sm.description: Small select height (36px). Use for: standard density forms, filter bars, secondary selects. Matches sm input height.

md.description: Medium select height (42px). DEFAULT. Use for: most form selects, settings, primary data entry. Matches md input height.

lg.description: Large select height (48px). Use for: touch-optimized forms, prominent selects, hero sections. Matches lg input height.

xl.description: Extra large select height (60px). Use for: high-emphasis selects, marketing forms, maximum touch targets. Matches xl input height.

xs.description: Extra small horizontal select padding (10px). Compact padding for xs selects. Leaves room for dropdown icon.

sm.description: Small horizontal select padding (12px). Standard padding for sm selects and efficient layouts.

md.description: Medium horizontal select padding (12px). DEFAULT. Same as sm - compact but comfortable for most use cases.

lg.description: Large horizontal select padding (16px). More generous padding for lg selects with better text breathing room.

xl.description: Extra large horizontal select padding (16px). Same as lg - comfortable padding for xl selects.

borderRadius.description: Select input border radius (4px). Matches standard input field radius for form consistency.

borderWidth.description: Select input border width (1px). Standard form control border. Clear boundary without visual heaviness.

xs.description: Extra small select font size (12px). Compact text for xs selects. Use for dense forms or secondary controls.

sm.description: Small select font size (14px). Standard text for most select inputs. Readable and space-efficient.

md.description: Medium select font size (16px). DEFAULT. Body text size for comfortable reading. Most common for primary forms.

lg.description: Large select font size (16px). Same as md - maintains readability without growing too large.

xl.description: Extra large select font size (18px). Larger text for prominent selects or accessibility focus.

borderRadius.description: Dropdown menu border radius (4px). Matches select input radius. Creates consistent, connected feel when open.

shadow.description: Dropdown menu shadow. Medium shadow provides elevation and separation from page content. Indicates floating layer.

padding.description: Dropdown menu inner padding (10px). Small padding around the options list. Options have their own padding.

maxHeight.description: Dropdown menu maximum height (300px). Limits dropdown size for long option lists. Enables scrolling when exceeded.

zIndex.description: Dropdown z-index stacking level (200). Above most page content but below modals. Standard popover layer.

x.description: Option horizontal padding (12px). Comfortable padding for option text. Wider click/tap target than text alone.

y.description: Option vertical padding (10px). Creates comfortable row height for options. Good for keyboard navigation and touch.

borderRadius.description: Option border radius (2px). Subtle rounding for hover/selected state backgrounds. Creates soft highlight effect.

duration.description: Select transition duration (100ms). Fast transitions for dropdown open/close and option hover states.

easing.description: Select transition easing (ease-out). Smooth deceleration for dropdown appearance and state changes.

size.description: Select chevron icon size (16px). Dropdown indicator arrow. Sized to be visible but not dominant.

spacing.description: Spacing between text and icon (10px). Separates selected text from chevron indicator.
